item.title: 'They sang about my family's death': Father's anger exposes divide in Israeli society
item.description: An Iranian missile killed Kasem's family in an Arab-majority town in Israel. The response shone a light on deep social issues.

item.title: Trump's Iran dilemma exposes bitter split in president's circle
item.description: The conflict has pitted the isolationist and hawkish wings of the US leader's party against one another.

item.title: 'What should we do?' Seeking clarity in Tehran as Israeli jets fly overhead
item.description: BBC Persian's Kasra Naji says his sister is among those who want to know where the conflict with Israel is leading.

item.title: Kenyan 'miracle babies' pastor dies in road crash
item.description: Televangelist Gilbert Deya has died in an accident and at least 30 other people are reportedly injured.

item.title: Lone Air India survivor carries coffin of brother killed in crash
item.description: A visibly upset Ramesh was overcome with grief carrying his brother's coffin to the crematorium.
